verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> month, the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H376>certain<s%> of the <S%H4480>elders<s%> <S%H2205><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Are <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of me? As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will <S%H518>not<s%> be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by you.

Wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> them, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> them? cause them to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of their fathers: <S%H1><s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them, to bring them <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I had <S%H8446>espied<s%> for them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> lands: <S%H776><s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Cast ye <S%H7993>away<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and defile not <S%H2930>yourselves<s%> <S%H408><s%> with the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me, and <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: they did <S%H3808>not<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> cast <S%H7993>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did they <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But I <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that it should <S%H1115>not<s%> be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were, in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, in bringing them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
Wherefore I caused them to <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3045>showed<s%> them my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H853><s%> he shall even <S%H2421>live<s%> in them.

Moreover <S%H1571>also<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and them, that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> they <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H853><s%> he shall even <S%H2421>live<s%> in them; and my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> they <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2490>polluted:<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H3615>consume<s%> them.

But I <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that it should <S%H1115>not<s%> be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>out.<s%>

Yet <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that I would <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H5414>given<s%> them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>lands;<s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> but <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

Nevertheless mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spared<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them from <S%H4480>destroying<s%> <S%H7843><s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> did I <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H3617>end<s%> of them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

But I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H1980>Walk<s%> ye <S%H408>not<s%> in the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> their <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> defile <S%H2930>yourselves<s%> with their idols: <S%H1544><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them;

And <S%H6942>hallow<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you, that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Notwithstanding the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me: they <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H853><s%> he shall even <S%H2421>live<s%> in them; they <S%H2490>polluted<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths:<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Nevertheless I <S%H7725>withdrew<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that it should <S%H1115>not<s%> be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>forth.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them <S%H1571>also<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that I would <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries;<s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> they had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> but had <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and had <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> that were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> whereby they should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live;<s%>

And I <S%H2930>polluted<s%> them in their own <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> in that they caused to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7356>womb,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> I might make them <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> to the <S%H4616>end<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they might <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H5750>Yet<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H1442>blasphemed<s%> me, in that they have <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against me.

For when I had <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to them, then they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5414>presented<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of their <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> also they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor,<s%> and poured <S%H5258>out<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H853><s%> their drink <S%H5262>offerings.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4100>What<s%> is the high <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>whereunto<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H935>go?<s%> And the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1117>Bamah<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Are <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H2930>polluted<s%> after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers?<s%> and commit ye <S%H2181>whoredom<s%> <S%H859><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations?<s%>

For when ye <S%H5375>offer<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> when ye make your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> pollute <S%H2930>yourselves<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> this <S%H3117>day:<s%> and shall <S%H589>I<s%> be inquired <S%H1875>of<s%> by you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will <S%H518>not<s%> be inquired <S%H1875>of<s%> by you.

And that which <S%H5927>cometh<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> your <S%H7307>mind<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be at <S%H1961>all,<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> We will <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> as the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>countries,<s%> to <S%H8334>serve<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>

As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H2534>fury<s%> poured <S%H8210>out,<s%> will I <S%H4427>rule<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you:

And I will bring you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> ye are <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H2534>fury<s%> poured <S%H8210>out.<s%>

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H8199>plead<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Like <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H8199>pleaded<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H8199>plead<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
And I will cause you to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4562>bond<s%> of the covenant: <S%H1285><s%>

And I will purge <S%H1305>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> among you the <S%H4775>rebels,<s%> and them that <S%H6586>transgress<s%> against me: I will bring them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>country<s%> <S%H776><s%> where they <S%H4033>sojourn,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

As for <S%H859>you,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> ye, <S%H5647>serve<s%> ye every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H310>hereafter<s%> also, <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: but <S%H2490>pollute<s%> ye my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> with your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and with your <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
